twoSetSkill.name: Blue Phoenix 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Upon attacking, create a Blue Phoenix Aura that lasts for 6s (effect cannot stack). CD: 9s. Allies within the Aura gain 30% All Elemental DMG to their attacks, while enemies within take 10% more All Elemental DMG.

threeSetSkill.name: Cathartic Aura 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Extends the duration of Blue Phoenix Aura by 3s. Allies in the Aura receive Ice Protection. While DMG received is less than 10 x Valkyrie's Level, the character will only take DMG and will not get interrupted.
